meanings.definition: The act of severing or separating something.
meanings.sent1: The disseverment of the rope was quick and clean.
meanings.sent2: The disseverment of the cake into slices was done carefully.
meanings.sent3: The disseverment of the two best friends over a silly argument was quite dramatic.
meanings.sent4: The disseverment of the clouds by the airplane's path created a striking image.
meanings.sent5: The disseverment of the paper with scissors made a satisfying sound.

meanings.definition: The state of being severed or separated.
meanings.sent1: The disseverment of the countries led to new borders being drawn.
meanings.sent2: The disseverment of the puzzle pieces made it challenging to complete.
meanings.sent3: The disseverment of the cookie jar from the shelf was accidental but amusing.
meanings.sent4: The disseverment of the family during the holidays felt like a metaphorical rift.
meanings.sent5: The disseverment of the river into multiple streams was a beautiful sight.
